str2: Wherefore, on which account, therefore. From dia and hos; through which thing, i.e. Consequently.
From ago; a field; genitive case, the country; specially, a farm, i.e. Hamlet.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I call, summon, invite, (b) I call, name. Akin to the base of keleuo; to 'call'.
From ago; a field; genitive case, the country; specially, a farm, i.e. Hamlet.
Blood, literally, figuratively or specially; by implication, bloodshed, also kindred.
A conjunction, preposition and adverb of continuance, until.
Today, now. Neuter of a presumed compound of the article ho and hemera; on the day; generally, now.
